website_summaries.verdict: A rugged solution for those who would rather not carry around yet another key.
pros: Keyless lock uses a 5-digit security code that can be reset to any code you choose
Features a universal fit and reinforced alloy body
Sponge-like coating protects steering wheel from scratching
cons: Some had problems opening the panel to change their combination code

customer_reviews.title: Device Too Small for SUV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2012 Ford Explorer and with it properly installed, you could still turn the steering wheel all the way around, effectively making it worthless. Needs to be longer. With that aside, it was easy to set a combo and set it back. The screw holding in the cover plate was a little tight, but with some muscle, was able to break it loose with the tools that came with the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Item was returned
customer_reviews.text: There is a set screw that must be loosened in order for the wheel lock to be operational. The set screw was installed so tightly it could not be loosened. The item was returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Best steering wheel lock ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy built, easy glide action on rod. Unlike the Club, I love not having to carry extra keys, Trust me- No one is going to bother to attempt picking 5 digit combo. Don't worry about the screw tab, it is easy to remove and change combo-if you ever want to. I already have been using this a few days in my Jeep and am very happy with my purchase. 😎👌
customer_reviews.author: Aaron  rhetoric

customer_reviews.title: Great safety bar without the need to carry around an extra key.
customer_reviews.text: So I love this safety bar. The only small downside and I am not sure I can blame the mfg for this is that my steering wheel has a bump in the middle which rubs against the bar (I drive a BMW 5 btw) and that has caused some wear and tear on the steering wheel. Also, due to the bump, it can be difficult to change the wheels for the numbers as they also rub up against the center of the wheel column. So keeping that in mind, I would certainly recommend this product. Why carry another key right? Also, you can set you own easy to remember 5 digit code.
customer_reviews.author: Kilmurry

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product, recently got it due to people braking into cars at night and also had manage to steal a whole vehicle from one of the neighbors, easy to change combination and stays in place very good, no looseness feel in it. Item arrived damaged outside in the box due how the Amazon dude just throw it on the floor and left, I was there in the other side of the window when it happened, anyway, i would recommend, 5/5. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: SAHELANTHROPUS

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this unique steering wheel lock. Heavy duty, easy to use, but best of all, no key to hassle with. I bought three of them. I doubt you could find them in a retail store! Once again, Amazon is Amazing in product selection, but best of all, superior in customer service !
customer_reviews.author: StantheMan

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very well built, and it is very convenient not to need a key. I had purchased a more conventional wheel lock with 2 keys but could not buy any more keys (I tried, but it didn't work). You do need to remove a set screw to set the combination and if, as some comments suggest, the set screw is in too tight or it strips then you will have a problem. Thankfully, I did not have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke instantly
customer_reviews.text: Screw stripped the first time I used it. Couldn't even open it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Smart Buy!
customer_reviews.text: After having our other club easily picked and then our car stolen we decided to try the LC Prime Steering Wheel Lock. Easy to use and a smart buy since key clubs are easily picked. Wish we would have known about this one before we spent money on the other lock.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Combination lock is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good idea for my convertible, but I didn't want to carry a key. I love the combination lock feature. Hopefully I won't have to find out how secure it is. It's heavy and seems like a good device.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie0125

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in my new vehicles.  But not very well in my 1957 Chevy.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money , and helps slow down the criminals.. Works very well in my new vehicles. But not very well in my 1957 Chevy. So I purchased another one for for my son-in-law's Mustang.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jianshe

customer_reviews.title: ... duty and strong but it dosnt work all that great on a Jeep Wrangler steering
customer_reviews.text: its well made and heavy duty and strong but it dosnt work all that great on a Jeep Wrangler steering wheel
customer_reviews.author: taneaw

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a sturdy and well made item. We've been having a rash of car thefts in town lately and I used to look out the window every morning to make sure the cars were still there. Not anymore. A thief is not going to want to spend time wrestling with this club. Love the fact that I never have to worry about keys either. If you lose a key you'll wish you had the number lock. Now I just have to keep my memory in tact!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Chiarappa

customer_reviews.title: Car Stolen
customer_reviews.text: My car was stolen last month, thankfully I was able to get it back and bought this incredible steering wheel lock which has provided safety and assurance that my car won't be taken any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Hoof

customer_reviews.title: No more lost keys
customer_reviews.text: I'n used to my truck version of The Club which is a little longer so receiving this caught me off guard. Other than that, the product is great. Solid hefty feel. Access to setting the combination is exposed once a screw is removed, but you have to know the combination to reset. I feel that should be addressed, but I would buy another one. I'm notorious for losing keys. Problem solved for this item. fits great on my 2003 Tacoma TRD.
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: BMW parked on the street - worry free
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. I park my car on the street without worrying about theft. Solid product and a lot cheaper than paying for a parking garage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G

customer_reviews.title: KEYLESS!
customer_reviews.text: Keyless, no worry about lost or misplaced keys. Easy to use. Functional.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great product, affordable price...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, affordable, very sturdy, easy to use, and feel secure that my car and truck camper are secure..
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Oakes

customer_reviews.title: My car is safe now
customer_reviews.text: I feel more relax when I leave my car at night.
customer_reviews.author: Fer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Sturdy. Combination lock is nice feature.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a product that is not a disappointment. Especially like the large number combination lock. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bar

customer_reviews.title: Sense of security
customer_reviews.text: I recommend dishing out a couple of extra bucks for the combination ones instead of the keys- what if you lose your keys? Feels really secure, and I feel like thiefs wouldn't go through the hastle of trying to cut through this
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: What size set screw?
customer_reviews.text: I lost the set screw. Anyone know what size I use as a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Zane

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just buy this one no key needed you'll use more its vary easy worth the extra doe.
customer_reviews.author: jon gowen

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: Good lock well made but if someone was watching you they could get your combination the letters are really big.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hess

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Just received this lock today and I am super impressed with the quality of it. It is made up of quality steel. Even tho it has weight it is a very nice looking piece of equipment. Highly recommend it at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product simply because of the combination lock mechanism and the fact that it's so well made. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Solid Protection
customer_reviews.text: The steering wheel lock is much stronger and heavier than any I've ever seen or used. It's easy to customize the combination and fits my Fiat 500 and Jeep Patriot. I will be giving these as gifts this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: it is very heavy, but works well. I like not carrying the keys. recommended
customer_reviews.author: KGBoogie

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Ease of installation - easy to take on and off - might be heavier then some would like.
customer_reviews.author: Houdini

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Lock is strong and easy to use. It takes only seconds to lock and unlock my steering wheel with this wheel lock. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ph.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely engineered, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Nicely engineered, solid construction, easy to set up the combination lock and seconds to fit - perfect, visible deterrent and not difficult to stow when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good heavyweight product that advantage is you can't use a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good heavyweight product that advantage is you can't use a master key to open it , so it would to much time to open it with a drill. Save product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great lock! Sturdy, easy to use. My wife prefers this over having yet another keyed device.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, hard to get off
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel lock is easy to hook onto my 2018 Toyota Tundra and it would make it harder to steal. The combo numbers are easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Slattery

product_meta.title: LC Prime Steering Wheel Lock Universal Vehicle Car Truck Van SUV Keyless Password Coded Twin Hooks Extendable Retractable Heavy Duty Security Guard Anti Theft Steel Plastic Blue
feature_bullets: ✔ HIGH SECURITY KEYLESS LOCK: Password protected, needless to carry a extra key with you. Mechanical digital password lock is relatively stable, durable, sturdy and reliable, does not need a key to open, preventing a universal key, 5 digit password to open, actually has a large number of password, password combination up to 13 million

✔ HYDRAULIC SHEAR: The lock body reinforced alloy molding, anti cutting, anti drilling, sawing prevention, prying prevention. adjust the size of tensile lock body according to the actual situation , convenient and practical

✔ MULTI FUNCTION USE: The lock time is short, fast and convenient use. The lock has a solid lock body, in addition to the anti-theft, can also used as a self-defense weapon and smash the window for safety escape

✔ STRONG VERSATILITY: Twin U Type lock fork design, more firmly fixed on the steering wheel. Extendable and retractable lock, fit most of steeling wheel diameter range from 7-15.5 inches (18-39cm). Universal fit for cars, vans, trucks and SUVs
✔ WHAT YOU GET: LC Prime 1x Steering wheel lock, 1x Screw driver, 1x Code modulation device. And our 60-day warranty and friendly customer service. Great choice for & Gift idea.
